summary: This small mod adds a very simple player house in Rorikstead, and a smelter behind the local inn.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]
[i][center][url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/bordeciel/habitations/moulin_de_rorikbourg]= Traduction fran√ßaise par Kobro =[/url][/center][/i]

Hello everybody! This small mod adds a free house shaped like a windmill to Rorikstead.

I really like Rorikstead, and I had been thinking about making a windmill-shaped house for a while, so I decided to give it a try. The inside is quite spartan, although it does have a couple of bookshelves, smithing amenities, and both enchanting and alchemy stations.

And, of course, this being a rural town, the house has crops outside, some livestock, and a couple of chicken nests.

The place is free, and fully navmeshed for your companions or spouse. Have fun!

Changelog:
3/31: Added a couple of extra cupboards for storage.
3/30: Removed silly-looking cow and corrected light sources.
3/01: Release.

[u][b]Notes[/b][/u]
I originally made this mod for the Steam Workshop. Link [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=127170514]here[/url]. To install, place the files in your 'Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Or use your mod manager of choice to install the mod automatically. Have fun!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
